author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jumeirah Group Celebrates Success At World Travel Awards 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Jumeirah Group Celebrates Success At World Travel Awards 2015
Jumeirah Group, the Dubai-based luxury hotel company and a member of Dubai Holding, has won four accolades at the World Travel Awards 2015 held in Sardinia, Italy.
At the red-carpet gala ceremony, three luxury hotels walked away with a total of four awards.
Europe’s Leading Hotel & Spa: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa, Spain; Europe’s Leading Hotel Residences: Grosvenor House Apartments by Jumeirah Living, England; England’s Leading Hotel Residences: Grosvenor House Apartments by Jumeirah Living and Germany’s Leading Hotel:Jumeirah Frankfurt.
Doris Greif as Regional Vice President Europe and General Manager of Jumeirah Frankfurt, said: “We are delighted to have been awarded four accolades from the World Travel Awards. This achievement recognises the commitment to excellence which Jumeirah has demonstrated across Europe and the dedication from our colleagues, who continue to deliver exceptional service around the world for our guests.”
The World Travel Awards are voted for by travel and tourism professionals worldwide. Established in 1993, the awards are recognised as a world-class hallmark of quality. Each year a series of gala ceremonies are staged to acknowledge, reward and celebrate excellence in the tourism industry.
Source:- Jumeirah
